title: NAMD Build Error
body:
Not sure if there is a new stable version of NAMD that completely builds. Is there a spack command which will update the package.py file for a particular spec. Any help would he greatly appreciated. 

Thanks

### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.13.3
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install namd
==> Installing namd
==> Searching for binary cache of namd
==> No binary for namd found: installing from source
==> Fetching file:///root/NAMD_2.13_Source.tar.gz
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /root/NAMD_2.13_Source.tar.gz
==> Failed to fetch file from URL: file:///root/NAMD_2.13_Source.tar.gz
    Curl failed with error 37
==> Fetching from file:///root/NAMD_2.13_Source.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-namd-2.13-twrima2abppekvmqimvdbxovki5qlgdu

/root/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1110, in do_fetch:
       1107                raise FetchError("Will not fetch %s" %
       1108                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1109
  >>   1110        self.stage.create()
       1111        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
       1112        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1113
```

### Platform and user environment
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux nocona-test.hpcc.ttu.edu 3.10.0-1062.9.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Dec 6 15:49:49 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linuxx86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 


### Additional information
```console
$ spack spec --install-status namd
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   namd

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Warning: gcc@8.3.0 cannot build optimized binaries for "zen2". Using best target possible: "zen"
 -   namd@2.13%gcc@8.3.0 fftw=3 interface=none arch=linux-centos7-zen
[+]      ^charmpp@6.9.0%gcc@8.3.0 backend=netlrts build-target=LIBS ~cuda~omp~papi+production~pthreads+shared+smp~syncft~tcp~tracing arch=linux-centos7-zen
[+]      ^fftw@3.3.8%gcc@8.3.0+mpi~openmp~pfft_patches precision=double,float arch=linux-centos7-zen
```Build is failing when it can't fin the NAMD 
```console
$ spack location -s namd
==> Warning: gcc@8.3.0 cannot build optimized binaries for "zen2". Using best target possible: "zen"
/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-namd-2.13-twrima2abppekvmqimvdbxovki5qlgdu
```
### General information

- [X] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
